Point Cloud Map Edit & Download (3D)

Contents

  • Edit
  • Download Costmap
    • Download via site
    • API Fetch Map

Point Cloud Map Edit & Download (3D)¶

Below is the Point Cloud Map details page. We could use the mouse wheel to zoom in/out and right click&drag to move around the map.

Edit¶

Coming soon…

Download Costmap¶

Our algorithm will generate 2D costmap automatically. The costmap is 100% compatable with robots.

Download via site¶

  • Click on the right side of map details page

  • Input the lider height to the ground and resolution of the costmap

  • Click OK to download the map.zip to your PC. The map.zip includes:

    • map.png, the costmap

    • map.yaml, the related YAML file of the costmap

API Fetch Map¶

  • Click Profile & Token link under and land to Profile & Token page.

  • Click button and get the token.

  • Download map via our API (bash code)

    curl -v -o map.zip -X GET "http://api.motivedge.io/map/MAP_ID/2d?h=0.5&r=0.05&me_token=TOKEN"

    • MAP_ID could be found in the map details page. (Next to the map name)

    • me_token is the generated token using above button. (Required field)

    • h means the lidar height to the ground. (Required field)

    • r means the 2D map resolution for each pixel. (Required field)

  • The fetched map zip file includes map.yaml and map.png (costmap). We could unzip the file (bash code):

    unzip map.zip

  • Now we could see the map in our system and we could update our robot map_server to use this latest map.

Attention

SDK will release soon

Our SDK is under developing and will be released soon. We don’t need above complicated fetch map steps after releasing.

Only one line of code will finish above all.
